author: Andrew Steel
comment: Great app, works better than most and I've tried most lol. Worth the money for Pro. Good to setup, great sync to other devices, good tracking or progress, good modern material design, good summary charts by muscle group, good template workouts but also easy custom workouts. Improvement suggestions would be , allow drag and drop change the order of excercise added to a workout as they can change weekly , and, allow to delete an excercise once added. Simple things but would make usability massivly better

author: Shane Hanley
comment: This is one of the best apps either in free mode or in the pro version. I started using it about 9 months ago and have just paid for the app as it is simply the best training / personal fitness / bodybuilding app out there. I have lost 45 lbs and gained strength in the process. Thanks for this app!! I couldn't recommend this more!

author: David Webb
comment: I love this app!  It's simple, powerful, and easy to use.  It's not cluttered with useless bells and whistles.  It's a very useful application, with a clean and simple design.  It's easily worth the $5 cost of the pro version.  The application's designer more than earned it!  It's a well thought out and executed application design.  Brilliantly done!
title: Brilliant App

author: MA C
comment: I love the app. you do have the option to export your data but it doesn't export your routines, and it would be cool if it could back it up in the cloud by itself, also it acts up a bit with Android wear
title: Love it

author: Danny Aimone
comment: Fantastic app. Helps me track everything I do in the gym and lets me see the progress I'm making (or not making.) My only complaint (and only reason I took a star off) is that when trying to make two different superset groups, it will not let you add the same exercise which really stinks. I'd love to be able to create two different groups for super sets and be able to have the same exercise in each. If this can be changed, I'd gladly change my rating to 5.

author: Abi Olvera
comment: Very worth the money. I just wish it had hip extensions! And if "legs" broke down into glute, hamstring, quad. Developer is very responsive and said he was working on it. :)
title: Motivational, keep stats on all your workouts

author: DJ Johnson
comment: It was great before the last update or 2. Now whenever I save a workout or create a new exercise it crashes and I have to start over. I thought purchasing the Pro license would fix but it hasnt. Please refund.

reply.author: Zoltan Demant
reply.content: Johnson, could you shoot me an email with some more details? You can reach me over at info@progression-app.com. Thank you.

author: Hashaan Thiyagaraja
comment: Beautifully designed, functional and easy to use. I have a suggestion though. Some exercises are listed as targeting multiple muscle groups, eg. the chin up targets the back and biceps. On the workout history page, only the primary muscle group is displayed on the graph (in the case of chin ups, biceps wouldn't be displayed). Would it be possible to add an option to also include the other muscle groups on the graph, adjusted by proportion?

author: Daniel Jasin
comment: Love the app!!! Great job guys! One thing I'd like to see is integration with the S Health app so I can better track calories burned and all that within S Health.
title: Love it

author: Vikram Adukia
comment: Great app for having some popular workouts easily accessible and trackable. One small feature request is to have a small countdown beep when you are going into your next set.

author: Sam X
comment: Great it works with android wear. Great material design. Would like to see body weight tracking added to see progress and a more accurate calories burned result
title: Best to date

author: Richard Bridge
comment: This app is a great way to track your workouts. I love the statistical feedback offered and the watch intergration is brilliant if you want to leave your phone in the locker. I would love to see a drop set feature and/or an ability to edit the data of a finished workout. Definitely a worthwhile app if you take your training seriously!
title: Incredible!

author: Hector Villagran
comment: This app is great, and it works very well my android wear. I would like to be able to add the same exercise multiple times in a set though. It will make tracking repeating sets of the same exercise done on the same day much easier.
title: Great looking app, easy to use and very functional

author: Michael Adams
comment: I really like the app, but I have to knock a star off because the export function is basically worthless, and that's why I paid for the pro version.  It exports the workouts into a spreadsheet with very little detail.  I don't have my reps and weight, which is what I wanted to put into Excel and graph.  Also no dark theme in this app, unlike the other progression app.  What do I get for having the pro version again?

author: Jonathan Vu
comment: I've used it for a few weeks and I've enjoyed using it enough to unlock the PRO version. I think it'd be nice if they added a feature to save previously calculated plates and an addition of a line graph with some data to help represent progress. Regardless, I will continue to use and support this app because of it's simplicity and minimalist design.
title: Great, simple, and recommended!

author: Jay Taylor
comment: Just amazing the amount of exercises and the interface is very clean and the ability to multiple exercises is incredible and be able to search. I bought it to support the developer.
title: BEST fitness app

author: Juhun Bae
comment: I can't seem to set my past workouts as my own.
title: Great but one thing

author: Kevin Budhoo
comment: Absolutely great app. For 5 stars, can you show the rest time overlayed on the app? Used to be there but looks like it's been moved to the background. Ability to add an exercise twice to a workout would also be great.

author: Nevada Hemopo
comment: One problem, every time i try to create a cardio workout the app automatically changes it to a weight based workout instead of a cardio workout once i save it

author: LJBenji14
comment: This app is awesome!!! It's so intuitive, it's visually pleasing, it's easy to use and it's way better than any of the other apps I've seen or tried. 10/10 would recommend, 100%, awesome app all around!

author: Valjean Lemoine
comment: I love this app I have been using it for a few months now great for setting up and tracking workouts/progression.
title: Great app!

author: theodore sopher
comment: Best fitness app, clean material design, effortless to use, great dev support.
title: Best fitness app

author: John Andrews
comment: Seems a good app but keeps crashing when trying to add my workout routine

author: Jacob Lieben
comment: Finaly an app to keep my training schedule. Works great and still improving.
title: Great fitness app

author: Michael Eyjae Angeles
comment: I would like to add the profile photo and cover photo on the side panel.
title: The best.

author: Virgie Portorreal
comment: Love the app, thought I'd support Zoltan by buying the pro version.
title: Love the app.

author: Tanya Simpson
comment: Easy ti uset
title: Like it

author: Ahmed Khaled
comment: Amazing Application!

author: Bonk - LCS Montages
comment: Awesome

author: Mary K. Trostmann
comment: I use this every time I go to the gym.  It's great at tracking your workout.  The developer is very responsive.  I tried out most of the other work out apps and this one came out on top!
title: Great app great developer!!

author: JF Prieto
comment: Very easy to use while working out, and a great set of features.  Keeps track of your previous reps/weight PER SET,  not just the last set like most other apps.  Dev is quick to respond & has some great features lined up for future release (e.g., more advanced chart analysis. 1RM, total volume, total reps, etc.)
title: Best Overall UI, Great Dev!

author: pepe11333377
comment: Bought it to support developer.
title: Great app

author: Angelika at Fit Meals and Moves
comment: This is what I have been searching for in a training tracking app for years! Finally it has arrived! Stoked! Would be nice to be able to back up the data to Google drive in the future 💪
title: The best there is!

author: Vevek Selvam
comment: The best app for tracking activities in the gym.

author: Roy Bowen
comment: I’m a gym rat, and I need an app for logging my lifting workouts. This app is exactly what I need. Here are some highlights of this app that are important to me.  * Simple layout, easy to navigate * Single screen for recording each set AND quickly reviewing previous workouts * Easy to add notes to each set * Countdown timer between sets that can be quickly adjusted * App stays running and continues to countdown when I switch to another app * Tons of pre-loaded exercises (I only needed to add two extra exercises to the exercise pool)  The biggest reason I’d recommend this app is because the developer is VERY responsive and is constantly improving this app. If you lift weights and need to record your workouts – get this app.
title: Sleek, yet functional

author: sevenslab
comment: Had this app for awhile now, just keeps getting better!!
title: Awesome workout app

author: Ken P
comment: So simple and effective. Love it.
title: Fantastic

author: Barney Barnes
title: Perfect, simple tracker. Does everything I need it to do.
